entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
